医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示行为障碍儿童的大脑结构差异新的研究表明，与正常发育的儿童相比，年轻人的行为障碍与大脑大部分区域的表面积差异有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-reveals-brain-struct-differences-in-children-with-conduct-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-reveals-brain-struct-differences-in-children-with-conduct-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbfda52d-674f-4708-8367-defe69e2ccb9 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 02:09:05 -0400 Study reveals brain structure differences in children with conduct disorder
Sapio Sciences 启动合作伙伴计划以加速研究和诊断Science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 今天宣布推出 Sapio 合作伙伴计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Sapio-Sciences-launches-partner-program-to-accelerate-research-and-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Sapio-Sciences-launches-partner-program-to-accelerate-research-and-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f278f075-4b22-4cb4-9730-2586b8c7c859 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 01:29:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences launches partner program to accelerate research and diagnostics
活跃的通勤者患精神和身体疾病的风险较低开放获取期刊《BMJ 公共卫生》上发表的一项大型长期研究发现，骑自行车或步行上下班或学习的通勤者患精神和身体疾病的风险可能低于那些不依赖这些选择的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Active-commuters-may-have-lower-risks-of-mental-and-physical-ill-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Active-commuters-may-have-lower-risks-of-mental-and-physical-ill-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f2660f8-1028-4798-a7e7-cfd3f65f81b4 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 01:21:07 -0400 Active commuters may have lower risks of mental and physical ill health
您的饮食如何塑造肠道微生物群并影响您的健康《自然评论微生物学》发表的评论强调了不同饮食如何影响肠道微生物组健康，强调需要精准营养来优化健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/How-your-diet-shapes-your-gut-microbiome-and-impacts-your-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/How-your-diet-shapes-your-gut-microbiome-and-impacts-your-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=064c5094-8dc4-4a8e-8ea9-c45aa80dc864 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 23:36:00 -0400 How your diet shapes your gut microbiome and impacts your health
研究发现，成年早期体重增加与晚年心脏健康状况不佳有关根据今天（周三）发表在《欧洲心脏杂志》上的研究，从 20 多岁开始体重增加过多的人到 60 多岁时心脏健康状况会较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Early-adult-weight-gain-linked-to-poor-heart-health-in-later-life-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Early-adult-weight-gain-linked-to-poor-heart-health-in-later-life-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7f5572c-ce79-4d74-86c2-64e57cc550bd Tue, 16 Jul 2024 23:33:00 -0400 Early adult weight gain linked to poor heart health in later life, study finds
突破性的交互式图谱为 TBI 患者提供精准医疗途径菲尼克斯巴罗神经研究所和匹兹堡大学的研究人员创建了一个庞大的交互式图集，最终可能帮助医生使用精准医学对创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 患者进行针对性治疗，并可能取代现有的统一治疗模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Breakthrough-interactive-atlas-offers-pathway-to- precision-medicine-for-TBI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Breakthrough-interactive-atlas-offers-pathway-to- precision-medicine-for-TBI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=213097e8-d8e7-4f94-8781-6c25990ec9df Tue, 16 Jul 2024 23:26:24 -0400 Breakthrough interactive atlas offers pathway to precision medicine for TBI patients
研究显示，15 年来，美国男性膀胱过度活动症患病率飙升 28%研究人员发现，美国男性膀胱过度活动症的患病率从 2005 年的 11.3% 显着增加到 2020 年的 14.5%，尤其影响老年男性、非西班牙裔白人、非西班牙裔黑人以及超重或肥胖的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Overactive-bladder-prevalence-in-US-men-spikes-by-2825-over-15-years-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Overactive-bladder-prevalence-in-US-men-spikes-by-2825-over-15-years-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fd328d3-dcf0-4602-8a07-0548d7ab577b Tue, 16 Jul 2024 23:08:00 -0400 Overactive bladder prevalence in US men spikes by 28% over 15 years, study reveals
加州大学欧文分校开发 ePRO 工具来改善少数族裔患者的癌症护理加州大学欧文分校的一个研究小组开发并实施了一项干预措施，以加强对接受化疗的少数族裔患者的癌症护理支持服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/UC-Irvine-develops-ePRO-tool-to-improve-cancer-care-for-minority-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/UC-Irvine-develops-ePRO-tool-to-improve-cancer-care-for-minority-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18b67a2c-f2ab-4b0c-873b-fea43a2645cc Tue, 16 Jul 2024 23:06:05 -0400 UC Irvine develops ePRO tool to improve cancer care for minority patients
研究发现，准确的肥胖测量是解决肥胖相关疾病的关键准确的肥胖评估对于了解肥胖相关疾病风险至关重要，但目前的临床测量方法具有很大的局限性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Accurate-adiposity-measurements-key-to-tackling-obesity-lated-diseases-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Accurate-adiposity-measurements-key-to-tackling-obesity-lated-diseases-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162706be-b9ef-4c5d-b4e5-084a80503ffe Tue, 16 Jul 2024 22:47:00 -0400 Accurate adiposity measurements key to tackling obesity-related diseases, study finds
加州大学洛杉矶分校研究人员获得 80 万美元资助用于治疗和预防侵袭性肾癌加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员从 V 基金会获得了 80 万美元的资助，用于寻找治疗和预防与富马酸水合酶 (FH) 基因突变引起的遗传性综合征相关的严重肾癌的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/UCLA-investigators-receive-24800000-grant-to-treat-and-prevent-aggressive-kidney-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/UCLA-investigators-receive-24800000-grant-to-treat-and-prevent-aggressive-kidney-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f202e6c-ecfa-4678-9cd8-afac2cdca0c6 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 22:40:05 -0400 UCLA investigators receive $800,000 grant to treat and prevent aggressive kidney cancer
